text: The 2020 California wildfire season was a series of wildfires that burned across the state of California in the United States. As of September 9, 2020, a total of 7,606 fires have burned , making 2020 the largest wildfire season recorded in California history. Climate change has increased the risk of wildfires in California. ==References== Wildfires Category:2020 fires Category:August 2020 events Category:Fires in California Category:October 2020 events Category:September 2020 events Category:Wildfires
title: 2020 California wildfires
